entry.title: Lappy Saga
entry.content: So, Lappy is happy. She's gotten her new hard drive. It's all mirrored from the old one, and now it's like no bad can happen.

entry.title: Lappy Lives... For Now
entry.content: Lappy Update: She's okay. She's got some bad sectors. She needs a new HD, and may get one soon. Thanks to Randy's MacBook for its concern!

entry.title: Quick Note
entry.content: Lappy is seriously ill. :( Unmountable boot volume. May need to go in for repairs... gotta take a closer look later. If she's gone for a while, I may be incommunicado, as I hate blogging from work.
